name: collective.a11ycheck
description: Reports accessibility issues to your site editors when a page is saved.

name: collective.bbcodesnippets
description: Provides generic and extensible BBCode markup integration for Plone.

name: collective.consent
description: Ask users for consent to different topics, before they can continue.

name: collective.dexteritytextindexer
description: Dynamic SearchableText index for dexterity content types. For Plone 6 this was merged into Plone core.

name: collective.documentgenerator
description: Generate Documents (.odt, .pdf, .doc) from content based on appy framework (http://appyframework.org) and OpenOffice/LibreOffice.

name: collective.documentviewer
description: Very nice document viewer that integrates DocumentCloud viewer and PDF processing into Plone.

name: collective.easyformplugin.createdx
description: Creates Plone content objects from EasyForm submissions.

name: collective.embeddedpage
description: A content type to embed remote HTML pages in Plone Classic and Volto.

name: collective.folderishtraverse
description: Traverse to first item in folder.

name: collective.folderishtypes
description: Provides the types "Folderish Event", "Folderish News Item" and "Folderish Document" as replacements for default types. Those types are able to hold any other content, like a Folder.

name: collective.geolocationbehavior
description: Geotagging for Plone content using LeafletJS.

name: collective.glossary
description: Content type to define a glossary and its terms.

name: collective.immediatecreate
description: Create content immediatly and skip the add form.

name: collective.lineage
description: Subsites: Turns subfolders of a Plone site to appear as autonomous Plone sites. There is also a whole ecosystem off addons specific to subsites.

name: collective.mailchimp
description: MailChimp newsletter integration for Plone.

name: collective.mirror
description: A content type that mirrors the content of any other container.

name: collective.mustread
description: Tracking user views on content that are marked as must-read.

name: collective.remoteproxy
description: Proxy for remote content. All remote URLs for which a local proxy was created are replaced in the resulting content.

name: collective.restrictportlets
description: Allows you to restrict the available portlets that non-Managers can add.

name: collective.richdescription
description: Formatable description field for Plone.

name: collective.workspace
description: Easily manage 'membership' in specific areas of a Plone Site. It allows to grant people access to areas of content using a membership group rather than local roles for each user, and to delegate control over that group to people who don't have access to the site-wide user/group control panel.

name: dexterity.membrane
description: Enables content to be used as users and groups in Plone sites.

name: plone.pdfexport
description: Generic PDF export functionality for Plone content.

name: Products.EasyNewsletter
description: Powerful newsletter/mailing product for Plone.

name: zopyx.ipsumplone
description: Creates demo content and demo images for Plone.

name: cioppino.twothumbs
description: Rate content using up- and down-thumbs.

name: collective.bookmarks
description: Bookmarks/ favorites/ wish-list for Plone.

name: collective.collectionfilter
description: Faceted navigation filter for collection or contentlisting tiles.

name: collective.elastic.plone
description: ElasticSearch Integration for Plone content.

name: collective.searchandreplace
description: Find and replace text in Plone content objects.

name: collective.solr
description: Solr search engine integration for Plone.

name: collective.taxonomy
description: Create, edit and use hierarchical taxonomies to categorize content.

name: eea.facetednavigation
description: Very powerful interface to improve search without programming skills. Configuration is done through-the-web and lets you gradually select and explore different facets (metadata/properties) of the content and narrow down you search quickly and dynamically.

name: Products.PloneKeywordManager
description: Change, merge and delete keywords/tags/subjects).

name: plone.app.mosaic
description: Powerful and extendable editor that allows users to compose the content of a page with different tiles.

name: collective.cover
description: Cover allows the creation of elaborate covers built around a drag-and-drop interface. Uses the same blocks/tiles ecosystem as plone.app.mosaic but a different approach to editing.

name: collective.contentsections
description: Offers a block approach for Plone 6 Classic based entirely on Dexterity content types.

name: plone.app.standardtiles
description: A set of standard tiles used by Mosaic, but can be used from any other tile manager.

name: collective.tiles.carousel
description: A slider tile for plone.app.mosaic based on the carousel component of Bootstrap 5.

name: collective.tiles.advancedstatic
description: A tile that shows html text (similar to the static text portlet), with some additional configuration like the possibility to add custom css classes.

name: collective.tiles.collection
description: A tile that shows a set of collection results with possibility to choose (and develop) custom layouts.

name: collective.easyformplugin.registration
description: Add a behavior to collective.easyform to manage registration forms for events.

name: collective.fullcalendar
description: Display events in a nice calendar UI using https://fullcalendar.io.

name: collective.venue
description: Venue type with geolocation support for use with events or any other location specific content.

name: collective.easyform
description: EasyForm provides a Plone form builder through-the-web using fields, widgets, actions and validators. Form input can be saved or emailed. A simple and user-friendly interface allows non-programmers to create custom forms.

name: collective.fieldedit
description: A flexible form to edit selected fields of a content type.

name: collective.honeypot
description: Honeypot protection for forms.

name: collective.z3cform.datagridfield
description: A field with a datagrid (table), where each row is a sub form.

name: collective.z3cform.norobots
description: A "human" captcha widget based on a list of questions/answers.

name: plone.formwidgets.hcaptcha
description: HCaptcha widget to protect Plone from bots, spam, and other forms of automated abuse.

name: yafowil.plone
description: Yafowil is a form library for Python. This is its Plone Integration package.

name: collective.linguatags
description: Multilingual Tags for Plone.

name: plone.app.multilingualindexes
description: Indexes optimized to query multilingual content made with plone.app.multilingual.

name: collective.autoscaling
description: Automatic scaling of large images. Useful to reduce your database size when editors upload too large images.

name: collective.behavior.banner
description: A behavior to create banners and sliders from banners.

name: collective.lazysizes
description: Integration of lazysizes, a lightweight lazy loader, into Plone.

name: collective.wavesurfer
description: Implementation of https://wavesurfer-js.org audio player for Plone.

name: plone.app.imagecropping
description: Crops Images in Plone manually using cropper JS library.

name: plone.gallery
description: Photo gallery view for Plone.

name: redturtle.gallery
description: Adds a gallery view with a carousel made with slick.

name: wildcard.media
description: Provides audio and video content types and behaviors.

name: collective.explicitacquisition
description: Disallow access to acquired content outside the current path.

name: collective.geotransform
description: Graceful E-mail Obfuscation for Plone.

name: bda.plone.gtm
description: Google Tag Manager Integration.

name: collective.behavior.seo
description: Adds extra fields used for SEO optimisation.

name: pas.plugins.ldap
description: Provides users and groups from a LDAP directory.

name: pas.plugins.authomatic
description: Authomatic OAuth1/OAuth2/OpenID Login Integration with Plone.

name: iw.rejectanonymous
description: Reject unconditionnally anonymous users from a Plone site, without any change in your security policy matrix or workflows. The basic use case is an extranet, where all visitors must be authenticated.

name: pas.plugins.headers
description: Reads request headers and uses them for authentication. Think SAML headers that are set by a front web server like Apache or nginx.

name: dm.zope.saml2
description: Supports SAML2 based Single Sign-On.

name: collective.impersonate
description: Allow administrators to impersonate another user. Useful for verifying workflow/permission set up on real content.

name: collective.pwexpiry
description: Provideds methods for stronger user passwords in Plone and password attack protection.

name: bda.plone.productshop
description: Flexible and modular e-commerce solution for Plone.

name: collective.exportimport
description: Export and import content and a lot of other data from and to Plone. The main solution for all kinds of migrations based on plone.restapi.

name: collective.migrationhelpers
description: Helpers and examples to use during migrations.

name: collective.jsonify
description: Export Plone content to JSON.

name: collective.transmogrifier
description: A configurable pipeline, aimed at transforming content for import and export.

name: plonetheme.tokyo
description: Tokyo Theme for Plone implements Bootstrap 4 into Plone, with an emphasis on keeping things as close to "default" as possible.

name: plonetheme.grueezibuesi
description: A kitten inspired theme for Plone 6.

name: collective.sidebar
description: A sidebar that consolidates toolbar and navigation.

name: collective.editablemenu
description: A customizable navigation menu for Plone.

name: Products.PDBDebugMode
description: Post-mortem debugging: open a pdb session whenever an exception occurs so you you can find out what is going wrong. Plus: By adding /pdb to a url you end up you in a pdb session on the current context. A killer tool for developers.

name: plone.reload
description: Code and configuration reload without server restarts.

name: Products.PrintingMailHost
description: Log mail messages instead of sending mail.

name: experimental.gracefulblobmissing
description: Gracefully handle missing binary files in Plone.

name: collective.relationhelpers
description: Helpers to manage, create, export and rebuild relations in Plone 5.x. For Plone 6 this was merged into Plone core.

name: collective.catalogcleanup
description: Removes data from the catalog that no longer belong to an actual object.

name: collective.fingerpointing
description: Keeps track of different events and write them down to an audit log.

name: collective.ifttt
description: Enables any Plone site to play in the IFTTT ecosystem. For example when a news item is published, then tweet about it or post it on Facebook.

name: collective.purgebyid
description: Use tag-based cache invalidation in Plone (e.g. with Varnish's xkey module).

name: collective.recipe.backup
description: Powerful and flexible backup/restore solution for Plone.

name: collective.revisionmanager
description: Manage Products.CMFEditions histories that can bloat your database.

name: collective.sentry
description: Sentry integration to aggregate errors and help finding their causes.

name: dm.historical
description: Access any historical state of your database. Can be useful to find out what happened to objects in the past and to restore accidentally deleted or modified objects.

name: haufe.requestmonitoring
description: Detailed request logging functionality on top of the publication events. Useful to find out what takes longer than it should.
